title: Request an Ergonomic Assessment
description: An employee is experiencing back pain and requests an ergonomic assessment of their workstation.

tasks.description: Receive the employee's request for an assessment.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR representative logs the employee's request.

tasks.description: Schedule a virtual or in-person assessment with the company's ergonomics specialist.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR schedules the assessment for the employee.

tasks.description: Based on the specialist's recommendations, coordinate with facilities to provide any needed equipment (e.g., monitor stand, footrest).
tasks.expected_outcome: HR facilitates the procurement of recommended equipment.
